definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: The Supreme Court is expected to  affirm the  original judgment.
sentences.chinese: 預計最高法院將維持原判。

sentences.english: If the verdicts and sentences are upheld, the executions must be carried out within 30 days.
sentences.chinese: 如果上訴庭維持原判，死刑必須在30天之內執行。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the court dismissed the appeal upheld.
sentences.chinese: 據此，法院判決駁回上訴維持原判。

sentences.english: Iran's supreme court upheld the conviction in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗最高法院2007年宣佈維持原判。
